document.full_text: dirk nowitzki scored a game-high 27 points and grabbed eight rebounds but the dallas mavericks power forward was the first to admit he was far from his best in the nba finals opener on tuesday.
document.title: nowitzki bemoans misses despite top-scoring effort
lines_and_colors: dirk nowitzki scored a game-high 27 points and grabbed eight rebounds but the dallas mavericks power forward was the first to admit he was far from his best in the nba finals opener on tuesday.
